Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Penn in 1973...
Injured on 8/1/1983 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Coney Island to Longport on 7/8/1984 (Going to LP: P C. Benson, C P. Engler. Going to CI: P S. Driggers, C C. Lane)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1984, winning 2 games with a 2.20 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1985, going 6-0, 3.06...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1985, going 27-5, 2.62 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/6/1987 to a 4-year deal worth $8,570,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1987, going 22-6, 2.36 ERA...
